alert.note: Alert for Lower Rio Grande Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 12 at 5:54PM MDT until May 13 at 11:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...East to northeast winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph possible. * WHERE...Lower Rio Grande Valley. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will occur below canyons along the Manzano Mountains, including Abo Pass.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.
